Alwin Tom

Fullstack developer

About
A dedicated fullstack developer who thrive on turning ideas into functional web applications. Passionate about staying on the cutting edge technologies and delivering exceptional results to clients and customers.
Specialization
  • Backend development using Java, Node JS, Python etc.
  • Front end developement using Angular, React JS etc.
  • CI/CD and Devops Tools
  • SQL and NoSQL databases
